channel.title: cynefin on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in cynefin on Mark Needham

item.title: XP 2011: How complex is software?
item.description: The last session I attended at XP 2011 was a workshop run by John Mcfadyen where he introduced us to Dave Snowden’s Cynefin model, which is a model used to describe problems, situations and systems. I’d come across the model previously and it had been all over my twitter stream a couple of weeks ago as a result of Dave Snowden giving a key note at the Lean Systems and Software conference.
